mapper.sql:
q.id AS question_id, q.stem AS question_stem, q.key AS question_key, q.analysis AS question_analysis, q.type AS question_type, q.difficulty AS question_difficulty, q.position AS question_position, q.purpose AS question_purpose, q.parent_id AS question_parent_id,
o.id AS option_id, o.description AS option_description, o.is_correct AS option_correct, o.position AS option_position, o.mark AS option_mark, o.question_id AS option_question_id
mapper.select:
( SELECT FROM exam_question q LEFT JOIN exam_question_option o ON o.question_id = q.id WHERE q.id = #{questionId} ORDER BY q.position, o.position )
UNION ALL
( SELECT FROM exam_question q LEFT JOIN exam_question_option o ON o.question_id = q.id WHERE q.parent_id = #{questionId} ORDER BY q.position, o.position )
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO exam_question (id, stem, `key`, analysis, type, difficulty, position, purpose, parent_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{stem}, #{key}, #{analysis}, #{type}, #{difficulty}, #{position}, #{purpose}, #{parentId})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE stem = #{stem}, `key` = #{key}, analysis = #{analysis}, type = #{type}, difficulty = #{difficulty}, position = #{position}, purpose = #{purpose}, parent_id = #{parentId}

INSERT INTO exam_question_option (id, description, is_correct, position, mark, question_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{description}, #{correct}, #{position}, #{mark}, #{questionId})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE description = #{description}, is_correct = #{correct}, position = #{position}, mark = #{mark}, question_id = #{questionId}
